snippet: The United States attorney in Chicago said that a top member of the Sinaloa gang had been cooperating with the authorities since he pleaded guilty to drug trafficking charges a year ago.
abstract: Jesus Vicente Zambada Niebla, who was arrested in Mexico in 2009 on drug trafficking charges, is said to be cooperating with authorities in hopes of receiving a lighter sentence.
lead_paragraph: The United States attorney in Chicago said that a top member of the Sinaloa gang had been cooperating with the authorities since he pleaded guilty to drug trafficking charges a year ago.

headline.main: Mexico: Convicted Trafficker Now Aiding U.S. Officials
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Convicted Trafficker Now Aiding U.S. Officials
